title: Litro reduces daily gas supply to 30,000
body_lines: Domestic gas will be supplied only to cities and essential services until the country recovers from the economic crisis, and it has been decided to supply only half of the gas demand in the future, a Litro Gas company official said.
The daily LPG supply was at 80,000 cylinders. With that decision, the gas supply has been reduced to 30,000, he said.
Considering the current situation, the country needs US $ 30 million a month to meet its gas demand and everyone must make a commitment to rebuild the country. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
